info.name: Feedly - 1920/1080 Optimized - GReader like
info.description:
I'm using GReader a lot, and knowing it will be discontinued, I had to find an alternative, here is a feedly style that make it look a bit more google reader. 
This is far from perfect, but I think it's already not too bad.
This is designed for 1920/1080 display and may/will not display properly on other resolutions.
It's a bit inspired of the excellent Mac OS X Lion userstyles for Google Reader from Allen Bargi.

Feel free to modify/fork do anything you want with it.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 0.4 2013/03/18
Various Fixes and spacing improvements
Display suggestions column on right side
Version 0.3 2013/03/17
Added some 3D effects for buttons
Fixed some remaining green colors
Fixed bug in store display
Version 0.2 2013/03/16
Fixed the header menu to stay visible
Fixed the feed store to show the search icon
Small cosmetic fixes for text color and menu link colors
Tested in Chrome 25
Version 0.1 2013/03/14
Some things are not working, and some have been hidden so you have to test to see if this suit your needs.
